helpString.value: Show or hide the Status bar
View using a two pane layout
View up to three lines per row
Switch the calendar to the Month view
Switch the calendar to the Week view
Switch the calendar to the Day view

MenuItem.title: Generate Content Items
MenuItem.helpString: generates a few different kinds of content items

MenuItem.title: Subscribe to Collection...
MenuItem.helpString: Subscribe to a published item collection

MenuItem.title: Subscribe to remote iCalendar... (experimental dialog)
MenuItem.helpString: Subscribe to a remote iCalendar (.ics) file

MenuItem.title: Edit collection rule...
MenuItem.helpString: Edit the rule of a collection

MenuItem.title: Get Mail
MenuItem.helpString: Gets new email from IMAP server

MenuItem.title: MIME Torture Tests
MenuItem.helpString: Loads real world complex / broken mime message examples provided by Anthony Baxter

MenuItem.title: i18n Mail Tests
MenuItem.helpString: Loads mail messages containing a variety of Charsets and Languages

MenuItem.title: Check Repository
MenuItem.helpString: run check() on the current view

MenuItem.title: Log View Changes
MenuItem.helpString: log the items changed in the current view

MenuItem.title: Log Repository History
MenuItem.helpString: log the items that were changed and committed in other views since the current view's last commit

MenuItem.title: Show PyCrust Debugger...
MenuItem.helpString: Brings up an interactive Python shell

MenuItem.title: Reload Parcels
MenuItem.helpString: Reloads any parcels that have been modified

MenuItem.title: Add All Additional Views
MenuItem.helpString: Adds all of the extra views to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add Block Demo View
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the block demo view to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add Repository Viewer
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the repository viewer to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add CPIA Viewer
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the CPIA viewer to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add Mixed View
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the mixed list view to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add Note-Kind View
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the Note-Kind view to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add Contact-Kind View
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the Contact-Kind view to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add Task-Kind View
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the Task-Kind view to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add Mail-Kind View
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the Mail-Kind view to the sidebar

MenuItem.title: Add all Kind-specific Views
MenuItem.helpString: Adds the Kind-specific views to the sidebar

ToolbarItem.title: Sync
ToolbarItem.label: Sync All
ToolbarItem.helpString: Get new Mail and synchronize with other Chandler users

_rule.value: for i inevery '//parcels/osaf/contentmodel/mail/MailMessageMixin' where i.isInbound == True
for i inevery '//parcels/osaf/contentmodel/mail/MailMessageMixin' where i.isOutbound == True
union(for i inevery '//parcels/osaf/contentmodel/Note' where True, for i inevery '//parcels/osaf/contentmodel/contacts/Contact' where True)

ToolbarItem.title: List View
ToolbarItem.helpString: Display the view in list mode

ToolbarItem.title: Month View
ToolbarItem.helpString: Display the view in month mode

ToolbarItem.title: Week View
ToolbarItem.helpString: Display the view in week mode

ToolbarItem.title: Day View
ToolbarItem.helpString: Display the view in day mode

body.value:
Welcome to the Chandler 0.4 Release!
This release is a milestone for us at OSAF. It marks a shift in focus from infrastructure and architecture to demonstrating key experimentally usable end-user features. In particular, we provide basic sharing, calendaring, and email functionality.
To get started, be sure to set up your e-mail and WebDAV account settings under the File | Preferences | Accounts menu. For a self-guided demo of 0.4 with accompanying screenshots, point your browser to
http://wiki.osafoundation.org/bin/view/Chandler/ZeroPointFourGuidedTour
To find out more about this release, please visit
http://wiki.osafoundation.org/bin/view/Chandler/ChandlerZeroPointFourReadme
This release is not intended for day-to-day use. Please do not trust your data with this version.
Thank you for downloading Chandler, The Chandler Team

description.value: A Contact to represent OSAF, as creator of the welcome note
